sentences: Douglas McCombs (born January 9, 1962) is an American musician who plays bass and guitar with the instrumental rock band Tortoise and leads the instrumental band Brokeback.
He is also the longtime bassist for the rock band Eleventh Dream Day.
In 1997, he formed Pullman with Bundy K. Brown, Chris Brokaw, and Curtis Harvey, with whom he released two albums.
In May 2018, McCombs replaced Eric Claridge as the touring bassist with Chicago jazz-pop outfit The Sea and Cake.
Brokeback is a project of McCombs.
It has featured the following artists:
James Elkington (The Zincs, Tweedy, The Horse's Ha)
Another Routine Day Breaks, 7-inch EP, Hi-Ball Records - 1997
Returns to the Orange Grove, Thrill Jockey - 1997
Field Recordings from Cook County Water Table, Thrill Jockey - 1999
Looks at the Bird, Thrill Jockey - 2003
Brokeback and the Black Rock, Thrill Jockey - 2013
Illinois River Valley Blues, Thrill Jockey - 2017
